p:
Little is known about the pathogenesis of Mayaro fever in humans, as the virus has not been associated with deaths. Thus no material is available for histopathologic examination.
1 The data regarding its pathogenesis are a result of experimental in vitro studies using Vero cell cultures. These have indicated intense cytopathic effects and cell death, with casein kinase 2 (CK2) having an important role during the Mayaro virus infection cycle.
7
